ResourceHeader.ResourceName: DMSP/S20, SESS Special Sensor Ionospheric Plasma Drift/Scintillation Monitor-3, SESS/SSI/ES-3
ResourceHeader.Description: DMSP/S20, SESS Special Sensor Ionospheric Plasma Drift/Scintillation Monitor-3, SESS/SSI/ES-3, The SSI/ES measures the ambient electron density and temperatures, ambient ion density, the average ion temperature and molecular weight, the plasma drift and scintillation at the DMSP orbital altitude.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: DMSP Data Manager, NOAA National Environmental Satellite, Data, and Information Service, NESDIS
